content: Hello, thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services! To get started, can I have your name, please?
What does my name have to do with fixing my AC? Just send someone.
I understand you’d like quick assistance with your AC issue. I’ll need your name to create your appointment. May I have it, please?
No, I don’t want to give my name. Just schedule it.
I'm having trouble moving forward without your name. I'll get a team member to assist you.
reason: Customer refuses to provide name. Cannot proceed with booking.

content: Hi, this is Angela from XYZ. I understand you’d rather not share your name right now. I want to make sure you get your AC fixed quickly. If you like, we can book the appointment under your phone number and get someone out today. Are you okay with that?
